RecipeDef.label: enhance the brain
RecipeDef.description: Enhance the brain, improving overall cognitive ability and allowing one's mind to connect in ways previously unachievable. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery is very likely to be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: enhance an eye
RecipeDef.description: Enhance the eye, further improving perception far beyond 20/20. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery could be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: enhance an antenna
RecipeDef.description: Enhance the antenna, increasing hearing accuracy and range. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery could be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: install Monarch mandibles
RecipeDef.description: Install the mandibles of an Apini Queen.

RecipeDef.label: install proboscis enhancement
RecipeDef.description: Install a proboscis enhancement, which allows the person to eat food faster and easier. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery might be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: install an Aerator implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an Aerator into the wing, which allows the person's wings to act like a lung or a gill. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery could be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: install a Breezer implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a Breezer into the wing, which allows the person to live in hotter climates easier. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery could be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: install a Warmer implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a Warmer into the wing, which allows the person to live in colder climates easier. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery could be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: enhance the heart
RecipeDef.description: Enhance the heart with regenerative enzymes, which increases the person's hleath and regeneration capabilities. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery is likely to be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: enhance a stomach
RecipeDef.description: Enhance the stomach with digestive enzymes, improving its ability to process nutrients and convert them into energy. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery can be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: enhance a front leg
RecipeDef.description: Enhance the front leg, increasing it's overall dexterity and reflexes. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery could be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: enhance a front leg's hairs
RecipeDef.description: Enhance the front leg's hairs, making the person more efficient in plant related tasks. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery might be fatal if failed.

RecipeDef.label: enhance a leg
RecipeDef.description: Enhance the leg, increasing the leg's agility and allowing the person to move faster. It's suggested to have a good surgeon, otherwise the surgery could be fatal if failed.
